string.text: A set of tutorials for the BHSRO mod

One of your limb is completely damaged, you cannot run, aim, and you might limp and walk very slow because of it 
 
 The broken limb is shown on the BHS HUD with a %c[ui_gray_2]Grey%c[white] label (only Text BHS or Hybrid) and in the BHS doll with a completely %c[d_red]red%c[white] bar 
 
 Such injuries can be fatal in a fight 
 
 broken arms makes aiming with guns very hard 
 
 while broken legs impairs your movement with limping and greatly reduced speed 
 
 on %c[d_blue]torso%c[white] and %c[d_blue]head%c[white] such drastic injuries means instant %c[d_red]death%c[white] 
 
 Therefore, it is preferible to delay as much as possible this outcome, by healing up the damaged limbs with painkillers before it's too late

You can restore the limb using medical supplies and the following procedure: 
 
 %c[d_blue]Surgical Kit%c[white] 
 First you need to treat the wound with a surgical kit or instruments 
 The UI will reflects this with the limb label turning to %c[d_purple]purple%c[white] and the bar being filled with a %c[d_blue]blue%c[white] streak 
 
 %c[d_blue]Splint%c[white] 
 Next, secure the limb with a splint 
 The UI will reflect this with the limb indicator turning to %c[d_red]red%c[white] and the limb bar being filled with a white streak again. 
 This simply indicates that the limb can be healed again with medicines or by sleeping. 
 
 There are other ways to restore limbs, like Surgical Instruments or a visit to the %c[d_green]doctor%c[white]

Use a %c[d_blue]painkiller%c[white] to speed up the healing process 
 
 %c[d_blue]Painkillers%c[white] comes with all strenghts but to heal up broken limbs quickly it is recommended %c[d_blue]Yadulin%c[white] 
 
 %c[d_green]Doctors%c[white] and general %c[d_green]traders%c[white] sells medical supplies, although they might charge you considerably 
 
 Similar supplies can also be found carried by other %c[d_green]stalkers%c[white], %c[d_green]stashes%c[white] or in %c[d_green]secured boxes%c[white] 
 %c[d_green]Tasks%c[white] might also give such supplies as rewards. 
 
 Eventually, if you have the resource and the right recipe, you can craft at %c[d_blue]workbenches%c[white] any medical supplies available in the game 
 
 Don't forget, a good night sleep is also an %c[d_green]inexpensive%c[white] way to heal your injuries. 
 
 
 
 %c[d_cyan]Rewards%c[white] 
 
 When you close this tutorial page you will be %c[d_cyan]gifted%c[white] with the supplies to heal your limb now 
 
 check your %c[d_blue]inventory%c[white] and follow the steps as detailed in the previous page

You are bleeding! 
 
 The damage you received caused bleeding. 
 
 %c[d_blue]Bleeding%c[white] is a serious condition, it can lead to %c[d_red]death%c[white] if not treated fast

You can stop the bleeding by mean of medical supplies 
 
 For example 
 
 %c[d_blue]Bandages%c[white] 
 %c[d_blue]Tourniquet%c[white] 
 %c[d_blue]Medkits%c[white] 
 %c[d_blue]Vinca tablets%c[white] 
 
 There is also the possibility to wear equipment/attachments that can manage or reduce the bleeding status 
 Such equipment is normally wore on the outfit's belt but also outfits themselves can be upgraded to provide basic bleeding management 
 
 For example 
 
 %c[d_blue]Technological devices%c[white] 
 %c[d_blue]Mutant pelts%c[white] 
 %c[d_blue]Artifacts%c[white]

Prepare yourself ahead 
 
 Visit doctors or general goods traders and stack up on supplies for your raids 
 
 Remember, according to the Zone Institute of Health, bleeding is the first cause of death amongst Stalkers 
 
 You can also craft, provided you know the recipe and have the resources, all medical supplies and equipment mentioned before 
 
 
 
 %c[d_cyan]Rewards%c[white] 
 
 When you close this tutorial page you will be %c[d_cyan]gifted%c[white] with %c[d_blue]bandages%c[white] to treat the bleeding now 
 
 check your %c[d_blue]inventory%c[white]

You are injured! 
 
 You received damage to your health and limbs 
 Leaving your limbs untreated can lead to the breaking of the limb entirely and sustaining serious side effects or even worse outcomes 
 
 %c[d_blue]head%c[white] and %c[d_blue]torso%c[white] when they are completely destroyed leads to death 
 
 damage to %c[d_blue]arms%c[white] will impair significantly your aiming 
 
 while with damage to %c[d_blue]legs%c[white] you will start limping and have reduced walk speed 
 running while in this condition will exacerbate and damage further the limb, so beware 
 
 Your best option is to treat the wounds as soon as possible

You can treat your injuries by means of medical supplies and in three ways 
 
 %c[d_purple]Fast treatmen%c[white] 
 
 When you are in combat, you don't have the time to heal properly your injuries and injuries tend to heal slowly overtime 
 Use %c[d_blue]painkillers%c[white] to give temp health to the injured limbs 
 Painkillers comes with different strenght, so use the right one for the situation 
 You can use multiple painkillers as their effect wears off or you are kept getting damaged 
 Medicines that acts as painkillers have in their tooltips %c[yellow]yellow colored descriptions%c[white] 
 
 %c[d_purple]Healing%c[white] 
 
 Healing limbs takes time, make sure you are out of combat when you attempt to heal yourself 
 The amout of health you can heal to a limb it's relative to the main health pool, so make sure your HP is at the maximum before taking any medicine for healing 
 Take stimpacks and medkits to gain back main HP 
 Medicines that heals limbs have in their tooltips %c[d_blue]blue colored descriptions %c[white] 
 
 %c[d_purple]Auto Healing%c[white] 
 
 Some special equipment can automatically treat injuries or heal you back up 
 For example 
 
 %c[d_blue]Autodoc%c[white] 
 %c[d_blue]Outfits upgrades%c[white] 
 %c[d_blue]Artifacts%c[white]

Prepare yourself ahead 
 
 Visit doctors or general goods traders and stack up on supplies for your raids 
 
 Remember, according to the Zone Institute of Health, bleeding is the first cause of death amongst Stalkers 
 
 You can also craft, provided you know the recipe and have the resources, all medical supplies and equipment mentioned before
